txt.en:
'It's hard to see the old place a mess like this. You would think with all the tribute the Dourhands have been withholding, they could keep the place neat and tidy. Bah, ill-mannered louts is what they are. But there I go running my mouth off again.

'Nos Grimsong over there has been handling our efforts to clean up trouble with the local wildlife. Go see if he has any tasks you can help with.

'Be sure to come back to me later, though; I'll have more work for you after you have gotten your beard wet.'
'Well met, [placeholder]. Aye, I have work for you. It is good that Bolli sent you.'
'You should go talk to Nos Grimsong. He is just over there, in the north-west corner of Frerin's Court.'
Intro: Return from the Lonely Mountain
'It'll take years to clean up the mess these Dourhands have made of the place!'
After many years of absence, a party of Longbeards has returned to the Blue Mountains and Thorin's Hall.
Talk to Nos Grimsong in Frerin's Court
Nos Grimsong can be found in the north-west corner of Frerin's Court.\n\nBolli instructed you to lend your aid to Nos Grimsong.
